regex.name: select
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): import xbmcgui dialog = xbmcgui.Dialog() ret = dialog.select('GP Mexico', ['[COLOR yellow]opcion 1[/COLOR]', '[COLOR yellow]opcion 2[/COLOR]']) channels = ['https://archive.org/download/Formula.1.GP.Mexico.Carrera.2017.MovistarF1.EventosHQ/Formula.1.GP.Mexico.Carrera.2017.MovistarF1.EventosHQ.mp4', 'https://archive.org/download/Formula.1.GP.Mexico.Carrera.2017.MovistarF1.EventosHQ/Formula.1.GP.Mexico.Carrera.2017.MovistarF1.EventosHQ.mp4'] return channels[ret]
